knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
Check to the amino acids present in the library's named_peptides.csv file to make sure all
are present in codon_weights.csv
```{r}
codon_weights <- read_csv(file = "codon_weights.csv", col_names = FALSE)
library_aa <- named_peptides %>% pull(sequence) %>%
  paste(sep="", collapse = "")

missing_aa <- intersect(library_aa[[1]], codon_weights$X1)

find_U <- named_peptides %>% pull(sequence) %>% str_detect(., pattern = "U")
```
